name: Oinkologne ♂
description: The Hog Pokémon. Oinkologne is proud of its fine, glossy skin. It emits a concentrated scent from the tip of its tail.

abilities.name: Lingering Aroma
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack or hits with a melee attack, one random ability of its attacker changes to Lingering Aroma until the end of the encounter or until switched out.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.
